{{About|Bedrock item tag|Item tags {{in|je}}|Item tag (Java Edition)|the tag item|Name Tag}}

An item [[Tag (Bedrock Edition)|tag]] is a group of [[item]]s. They are used when a [[recipe]] allows multiple different items as inputs and control many other gameplay features. See below for the use of each item tag.
